subject: Re: [junit] Data-driven testing
msgSnippet: Herman, If you re using JUnit 4, the Parameterized test runner is a good start.  You can start with Googling for junit 4 parameterized . Thanks, David Saff
messageBody:
Herman,

If you're using JUnit 4, the Parameterized test runner is a good
start. You can start with Googling for "junit 4 parameterized".
Thanks,

David Saff

On 6/28/07, Herman Scheepers <hermans0101@...> wrote:
> Hi all
>
> I am a JUNit newbie - does anyone perhaps know if what the de-facto
> standard approach is to data-driven JUnit testing (if something like
> that exists).
>
> Is it even relevant as far as unit testing is concerned?
>
> Regards
> Herman
